name: Iz-terruption
description:
Created for Our Jam Means Death #1, Iz-terruption is a fangame for Our Flag Means Death. Set during the iconic "You wear fine things well" scene, your task is to prevent Izzy from interrupting Ed and Stede's moment. There are four endings, depending on the time it takes for Izzy to reach them.

Programming done by me. Art done by Chasersgaming on opengameart.org, with slight modifications by me. Music written by Erik Satie and arranged by me.
